verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
More love more power
More of You in my life
More love more power
More of You in my life

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
And I will worship You
With all of my heart
And I will worship You
With all of my mind
And I will worship You
With all of my strength
For You are my Lord

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
And I will seek Your face
With all of my heart
And I will seek Your face
With all of my mind
And I will seek Your face
With all of my strength
For You are my Lord
